name: Stormcaller

system.description: A massive warhammer wreathed in crackling lightning. Legends say it was wielded by a storm giant who fell defending the mortal realms. The weapon hums with barely-contained power, and thunder rumbles with each swing. When struck against the ground, it can summon devastating lightning storms.

notes: Features: Lightning Strike (chain lightning on hit), Thunder Crash (AoE slam), Storm's Fury (summon lightning storm once per day), Shock Aura (passive damage to nearby enemies)
